resources.string: No locations to display - Add filters to get locations

GoSomewhere is an app designed to make deciding where to go a lot less stressful and pain inducing by helping you make up your mind on where you will go. To find places to go, you use the “Filter Results” tab that can be found in the menu. On this page, you can enter the radius which you want to search from your current location and check the types of places that you would be willing to visit. After pressing the “Apply Filters” button you will then have locations marked on your map and all you need to do is press the “Go Somewhere” button to select a random location. This app is designed to make deciding where to go a lot less stressful and pain inducing. Happy Travelling.
For this app to work, you must allow location and internet privileges.
This app also works in the following languages:
